comments:
Description:
Please refer to the bug https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=101595

a data set which has no result column should not be drag or insert to the layout. So the "Insert in layout" should be gray out, and prohibit user to drag it and get a 0*0 table in the layout.It will cause an error

Step to reproduc:
1. Add a data sampledb data source
2. Create a data set and don't input any SQL in the Query
3. Drag the no-resultset data set to the layout

Actual result:
An error occured:
